Text: Thanks for upload TvTeam! You have to wonder why there was a hydraulics failure during such a crucial moment in an Olympic opening...but I guess even at the best of times, Murphy's Law is ALWAYS in full effect LOL. Thanks again..from a Canadian in Dubai!

Incomplete!  The claim is that the total play time is 2 hrs 50 mins.  Actually, the total play time of the two .avi's is 1 hr 41 mins.  I suspect that this is just eztv's "CD1" and "CD2" (there are three CD's for the total show).
